channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: UK probes how TikTok, Reddit, and Imgur protect child privacy
item.description: The U.K.’s privacy watchdog has launched investigations into three social media companies over how they go about protecting the privacy of children on...

item.title: Amazon’s Delivery Drones Are Grounded. The Birds and Dogs of This Texas Town Are Grateful
item.description: Amazon’s drones met more resistance in College Station, Texas, than in any other city in the US. Now they’re gone—and a sense of peace and privacy has...

item.title: Mozilla rewrites Firefox’s Terms of Use after user backlash
item.description: Critics said the new terms implied Mozilla was asking users for the rights to whatever data they input or upload through Firefox. © 2024 TechCrunch. A...

item.title: Deutsche Telekom and Perplexity announce new ‘AI Phone’ priced at under $1K
item.description: It was inevitable that this year at MWC in Barcelona, at least one carrier would announce a major effort at building a smartphone with a top AI compan...

item.title: Tushy Aura Electric Bidet Review: Budget Bidet Maker Goes Luxe
item.description: The best-known budget bidet maker successfully counters high-end electric bidets (with a few minor quirks).

item.title: Tonal 2 Review: Smarter Strength Training
item.description: If you're all-in on digital weight training, you'll want to splurge on this fancy slab for sweating.

item.title: 14 Best Office Chairs of 2025— I've Tested 55+ to Pick Them
item.description: Sitting at a desk for hours? Upgrade your WFH setup and work in style with these comfy WIRED-tested seats.

item.title: Chinese buyers are getting Nvidia Blackwell chips despite U.S. export controls
item.description: Upholding export controls on semiconductor chips made in the U.S. may be harder than Washington D.C. thinks. Chinese buyers are getting their hands on...

item.title: The 8 Automatic Litter Boxes We've Tested and Recommend (2025)
item.description: With these high-tech cat boxes, gone are the days of bending over, scooping, and covering your nose. Welcome to the future.

item.title: Conan O’Brien comments on AI during his opening monologue at the Oscars
item.description: When hosting the 2025 Oscars last night, comedian and late-night TV host Conan O’Brien addressed the use of AI in his opening monologue, reflecting th...
